content: We need to setup a proper lang team initiative here, I think!
which means you need a liaison, mostly
I started work on an impl, though I haven't had a ton of time to work on it recently.
OK, I'm asking because we're accumulating initiative updates in #t-lang > 2021-10-06 planning meeting
maybe you can drop a few lines there? I hope to get a series of blog posts too
so anything you want in there, let me know :)
Is there somewhere we can see the impl progress? I'll happily implement the part that concerns exhaustiveness checking when the moment comes. Let me know
I've got the implementation on my fork of rust-lang/rust (https://github.com/chorman0773/rust/tree/deref-patterns)
Hey @Connor Horman ! What's the current status of this implementation? Are there things I can do to help get a PR ready?
Appoligies, I've been busy with school and with other projects, so I haven't had a chance to work on this. I'm probably able to continue next week after my finals are done
@Connor Horman Great! I'll make a note to check back in. Feel free to message me if you have any questions during the implementation!
Hey @Connor Horman! Were you able to get back to this? Anything I can do to help?
Not yet, no. After finals, I ended up working on lccc (C frontend and architecture/codegen, which can now compile Hello World). I may get to this tomorrow or thursday.
@Connor Horman Okay! I'll check back later in the week. :)
